rules_text:
[i]First, for Lord Daikoku – [/i]When Tewi enters, create a Food token.
[i]Second, for his 180 children – [/i]Whenever you sacrifice an artifact, create a 1/1 white Rabbit creature token.
[i]We'll keep pounding mochi![/i] – {BR}{BR}, Sacrifice a Food: Tewi deals 3 damage to target creature.
